participant_1.background:
I took my camera with me to take photos of the beautiful scenery and interesting people I met.
I know my family from growing up together.
I prefer to listen to my own music on my own terms.
My dog is my best friend, so I'd love to have lunch with him and learn some new tricks to teach him.
i want to own a house on a beach.

I love to swim in the lake, even if it makes me a weirdo.
I'm scared that my child will never be able to live a normal life.
i like to cook new recipes.
I ride my moped with the wind in my hair and music in my ears.
I remember feeling safe and loved in my childhood home.

content.text: Hi, my name is participant_1. What's your name?
I like to take photos of beautiful scenery and interesting people I meet. What do you like to do for fun?
I love to swim in the lake, even if it makes me a weirdo.
I have never been swimming in a lake before. Why do you like it so much?
I love the feeling of the water on my skin and the freedom of being able to move around in any direction. I also love the sound of the waves crashing against the shore.
That sounds really nice. I'd love to try it sometime.
You should! It's a lot of fun.
I grew up in a small town in the Midwest.
It's a pretty quiet place. Everyone knows everyone else. I miss it sometimes.
I'm from the city, so I can imagine how you feel.
Are you excited to move to a new city?
I am a little bit nervous, but I'm also excited for a new adventure.
